multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop

Class BaseDesktopManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
      • multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop.BaseDesktopManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.DesktopManager

    public class BaseDesktopManager
extends javax.swing.DefaultDesktopManager
    This class provides a custom desktop manager for BaseDesktopPane.
    Version:
    1.0 9-Aug-2001
    Author:
    Tom Tessier
    See Also:
